sys_hub_action_type_definition.description: Given the RITM as the input, this action will check all related catalog tasks and will return an "Open" or "Closed" status depending on whether the tasks or active or closed as well as the count of open tasks
sys_hub_action_type_definition.name: Check RITM Catalog Task Status
